name: OpusExpo eBooks
tag_list: ebook, publishing, books, canadian, online, epub
overview:
OpusExpo Inc. is an emerging e-Publishing firm headquartered in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. Apart from being one of the only Canadian eBook stores, it is also one of the only eBook stores which specialize in offering eBooks formatted for eBook Readers - Sony Readers in particular. First founded and incorporated in late 2007 by Aaron Shapland, the company was proud to unveil its online storefront on Canada Day (July 1) 2009, after an active period of logistical planning and building a sustainable online infrastructure.

The company currently offers classic titles in eBook form through its premier imprint OpusExpo Classics, including titles such as War of the Worlds, The Jungle Book, Treasure Island, Journey to the Centre of the Earth, and many more. OpusExpo Inc. is busy building its collection of exclusive titles for its next imprint, OpusExpo Originals, which will boast exclusive novels in eBook form, written by emerging authors from Canada and abroad.

By utilizing the green alternatives offered by eBooks, and asserting a Canadian presence in the emerging ePublishing industry, OpusExpo is well underway in establishing a more convenient and costâ€efficient publishing process that takes into consideration strong environmental values and revolutionary simplicity.
